turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to understand why my recent medical claim was denied. Can you help?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, I can certainly try. To help you best, could you please provide me with your claim number and date of service?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, the claim number is 1234567890 and the date of service was 2024-03-15. I'm so frustrated because I really needed that procedure!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. I'm retrieving the details for claim 1234567890 from 2024-03-15. The denial reason appears to be 'lack of pre-authorization'. Please wait a moment while I gather further details.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Lack of pre-authorization? But I was told by my doctor that this was covered! What are my options now? And, realistically, how long will it take to appeal this? This is really bad.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: You are correct in that if your doctor provided information to you about coverage then that is important. Unfortunately, I do not have all of the details right now about the process. Let me redirect you to a human agent for further assistance. Please wait while I connect you.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, thanks. Hopefully, they can help me sort this out. I appreciate your initial help.
